<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Droskar (The Dark Smith)](/Deities.aspx?ID=28)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 64, [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 64</row>

Cast out and cursed by [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18), the Dark Smith works constantly to prove his significance, cheating and enslaving others to further his goal

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** achieve goals at any cost, continually improve your abilities, establish dominance, work ceaselessly

**Anathema** fail to work toward goals or grow in skill, relax excessively or give into sloth

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Hammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=29)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=33)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=1), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=13)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147)

- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

</column>
